articles.title: The TrueAchievements Twelve Days of Christmas Challenge is back for 2022! - TrueAchievements
articles.description: Good news for those of you who have been looking forward to a new Community Challenge — Twelve Days of Christmas is back on TA, giving twelve unique challenges to players hunting achievements during December.
